name: spritzlint
description: A set of eslint rules for beautiful JS and more

scripts.release:major: git commit -m 'Updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: git commit -m 'Updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: git commit -m 'Updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags

author: Matteo Vinci <matteovinci88@gmail.com>
